"A bayonet wound. I remained at the front. Remember, your excellency!" 
Tushin's battery had been forgotten and on- ly at the very end of the action did Prince Ba- gration, still hearing the cannonade in the cen- ter, send his orderly staff officer, and later Prince Andrew also, to order the battery to re- tire as quickly as possible.
